name: Minecraft Curseforge Darkened
description: Since all other styles for the site are incomplete or stuck/abandoned in a rewrite, i decided to make my own. Nothing special, but i believe i got all bright spots. I tried to stick to the original color scheme and only change the brightness.
css:
@-moz-document domain("minecraft.curseforge.com") {
body:not(.mce-content-body) {
    background: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)), url('data:image/png;base64,') !important;
    background-size: 200px !important;
    /* Compatibility much... */
    image-rendering: -moz-crisp-edges !important;
    image-rendering: crisp-edges !important;
    image-rendering: pixelated !important;
}

body.body-home .home-call-to-action-container,
body.body-home .home-client-promo-contianer,

    background: transparent !important;
}
